chatGptUpsellContent.exercismInsiders:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Exercism Insiders upsell section.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback → Upsell content (H2 heading)
**When Users See This**: When the ChatGPT feature is unavailable to the user and an upsell is shown.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Exercism Insiders"
chatGptUpsellContent.donateToExercismAnd:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory paragraph for the Exercism Insiders upsell.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback → Upsell content (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When the ChatGPT feature is unavailable to the user and an upsell is shown.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Donate to Exercism and get behind the scenes access and bonus features."
chatGptUpsellContent.needHelpGettingUnst:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of the benefits of donating, specifically highlighting the ChatGPT Integration.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback → Upsell content (paragraph below initial description)
**When Users See This**: When the ChatGPT feature is unavailable to the user and an upsell is shown.
**Technical Context**: Includes bold text for "ChatGPT Integration".
**Current English**: "Need help getting unstuck? Unlock our **ChatGPT Integration** and extra mentoring slots, as well as Dark Mode, exclusive badges and more, when you donate to Exercism."
chatGptUpsellContent.learnMore:
**Functional Purpose**: Call to action to learn more about Exercism Insiders.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback → Upsell content (button text)
**When Users See This**: When the ChatGPT feature is unavailable to the user and an upsell is shown.
**Technical Context**: Text for a primary button.
**Current English**: "Learn More"
askChatGpt.couldntReceiveFeedback:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when feedback from ChatGPT could not be received.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (error state)
**When Users See This**: When there's an unexpected issue preventing ChatGPT feedback from being displayed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Couldn't receive feedback"
askChatGpt.chatGptsSuggestions:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the ChatGPT's response section.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (H2 heading within response)
**When Users See This**: After ChatGPT has successfully generated and returned suggestions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "ChatGPT's Suggestions"
askChatGpt.chatGptHasTheFollowingSuggest:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory sentence for ChatGPT's suggestions.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (paragraph above suggestions)
**When Users See This**: After ChatGPT has successfully generated and returned suggestions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "ChatGPT has the following suggestions:"
askChatGpt.reminderUseThisAdviceWisely:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for a caution text block about using ChatGPT's advice.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (caution block header)
**When Users See This**: Within the displayed ChatGPT response.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; part of a caution block.
**Current English**: "Reminder: Use this advice wisely"
askChatGpt.askingChatGPT:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating that ChatGPT is currently processing a request.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (loading state)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a user asks ChatGPT for help, while waiting for a response.
**Technical Context**: Bolded text; accompanies a spinner and loading bar.
**Current English**: "Asking ChatGPT…"
askChatGpt.estimatedRunningTime15s:
**Functional Purpose**: Estimated time for ChatGPT to provide a response.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (loading state)
**When Users See This**: While ChatGPT is processing a request.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to the "Asking ChatGPT" message. "15s" refers to seconds.
**Current English**: "Estimated running time 15s"
askChatGpt.getUnstuckWithChatGPT:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the initial prompt to use ChatGPT.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (H2 heading within unfetched state)
**When Users See This**: When the user has not yet asked ChatGPT for help.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Get unstuck with ChatGPT"
askChatGpt.ifYoureFeelingStuckAndCantSee:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouragement and instruction on how to use ChatGPT for help.
**UI Location**: Editor → ChatGPT Feedback (paragraph within unfetched state)
**When Users See This**: When the user has not yet asked ChatGPT for help.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "If you're feeling stuck and can't seem to make progress, don't worry - just ask ChatGPT for help and get back on track."
